sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ManageAlbumCreate></ManageAlbumCreate>
    <b-tab title="消息管理" active  v-if="renderComponent">
        <b-row>
            <b-col md="3">
                <b-list-group v-for="(item,index) in albums" :key="index">
                    <b-list-group-item active v-if="index == editing.current" @click="select(index)">
                        <b-badge>{{ item.id }}</b-badge>
                        {{ item.name }}
                    </b-list-group-item>
                    <b-list-group-item v-if="index != editing.current" @click="select(index)">
                        <b-badge>{{ item.id }}</b-badge>
                        {{ item.name }}
                    </b-list-group-item>
                </b-list-group>
            </b-col>
            <b-col md="9">
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">相簿編號</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editing.data.id" placeholder="Enter your name" disabled></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">相簿名稱</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editing.data.name" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">內文</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-textarea
                            id="textarea"
                            v-model="editing.data.context"
                            placeholder="Enter something..."
                            rows="10"
                            max-rows="6"
                            >
                        </b-form-textarea>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">編輯者</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input disabled v-model="editing.data.editor" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">建立時間</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input disabled v-model="editing.data.created_at" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">更新時間</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input disabled v-model="editing.data.updated_at" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">圖片</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-row>
                            <b-col md="4 text-center mt-2" v-for="item in photos" :key="item.id">
                                <b-card :img-src="'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/storage/app/' + item.path" 
                                img-alt="Image" 
                                img-top>
                                    <b-button variant="warning m-2">交換</b-button>
                                    <b-button variant="danger m-2">刪除</b-button>
                                    <template #footer>更新於{{ moment(item.updated_at).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM") }}</template>
                                </b-card>
                            </b-col>
                        </b-row>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row>
                    <b-col md="12 text-center">
                        <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="updateData(editing.data.id)">更新</b-button>
                        <b-button variant="danger m-2" @click="deleteData(editing.data.id)">刪除</b-button>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>    
            </b-col>
        </b-row>
    </b-tab>
</template>

<script>
import moment from 'moment'
import axios from 'axios';
import ManageAlbumCreate from '../components/Manage-Album-Create.vue';

export default {
    name: 'App',
    components: {
        ManageAlbumCreate
    },
    data(){
        return {
            renderComponent: true,
            albums: [],
            editing: {
                current: 0,
                data: [],
            },
            changeSelect: false,
            photos: []
        }
    },
    created(){
        this.moment = moment;
        axios
            .get('http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/album')
            .then(response => {
                this.albums = response.data.data;
                this.editing.data = this.albums[0];
                this.editing.current = 0;
                axios
                    .get('http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/file/filter/5/' + this.editing.data.id)
                    .then(response => {
                        this.photos = response.data.data;
                    })
                    .catch(error => {
                        console.log(Promise.reject(error));
                    });
            })
            .catch(error => {
                console.log(Promise.reject(error));
            });
    },
    computed:{
        // photoData: function(){
        //     return this.edit(this.editing.data.id);
        // }
    },
    methods: 
    {
        edit(id){
            axios
                .get('http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/file/filter/5/' + id)
                .then(response => {
                    this.photos = response.data.data;
                })
                .catch(error => {
                    console.log(Promise.reject(error));
                });
            return this.photos;
        },
        updateData(id){
            axios({
                method: 'post',
                url: 'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/album/update/' + id,
                data: this.editing.data,
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json",
                    "Accept": "application/json",
                    "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'),
                }
            })
            .then( () => {
                // console.log(response.data);
                this.renderComponent = true;
            })
            .catch( (error) => {
                console.log(Promise.reject(error));
            });
        },
        deleteData(id){
            axios({
                method: 'delete',
                url: 'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/album/delete/' + id,
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json",
                    "Accept": "application/json",
                    "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'),
                }
            })
            .then( () => {
                this.renderComponent = true;
            })
            .catch( (error) => {
                console.log(Promise.reject(error));
            });
        },
        select(num){
            this.editing.current = num;
            this.editing.data = this.albums[num];
            axios
                .get('http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/file/filter/5/' + this.editing.data.id)
                .then(response => {
                    this.photos = response.data.data;
                })
                .catch(error => {
                    console.log(Promise.reject(error));
                });
        }
    }
}
</script>
